text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I was watching one of my mother's<n>plays on a
streaming site last night.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I don't even remember how many times I<n>watched
it, but by the time I realized, it<n>was already
morning.
choice_data_list: You must really love your mother's plays.
You must really love your mother's plays.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I do. Watching a play through the screenis nothing like experiencing theacoustics and intensity in person, but it'sstill... Yawn.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Sorry. I'll have to be mindful not to pull<n>any more
all-nighters. I'll try to wake<n>myself up in time for
training.
